comments: Apparently a bisection of A047691.The numerators in the e.g.f. of x/2, sinh(cosec(x)-cotan(x)) = x/(2^1*1!) +3*x^3/(2^3*3!) +37*x^5/(2^5*5!) +959*x^7/(2^7*7!) +41641*x^9/(2^9*9!)+.. are apparently covered by the absolute values of A003717.
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Values replaced by numerators. - R. J. Mathar, Dec 19 2011
